posts.post_content:
Go get 'em boys.  I've seen worse.  Rare Piedmont backs.
This five pack is available for $64.95.

Winter's coming, I'll use them for kindling, if I have to.

Paypal gift or payment owed preferred, but will consider barter for livestock or cards, as well as checks or money orders.   

Individual pricing reduced.

Camnitz Arms Folded             $16
Camnitz Arms Down              $14
Burns                                   $12
Burch Fielding                       $16
Brashear                              $12

Add $2 for shipping for any number of cards.
Bump for price drop.  Doors open at 9AM.
Okay, the last bump wasn't the last.
